description: Identify the single 'Top Offer' of the business. The Top Offer must be the core product or service, ideally the biggest revenue generator or the main reason customers visit this business. Ignore generic vouchers or minor accessories.

topOfferName.description: The name of the core offer, course, or product (in German).

topOfferPrice.description: The price of the offer, if available (e.g. '2.990 â‚¬').

topOfferDescription.description: A brief description of what is included in this offer (in German).

topOfferLink.description: The specific URL to this offer's page.

topOfferBookingPage.description: Link to the appointment booking page, contact form, or checkout page specifically for this offer.

topOfferReason.description: Reason why this was selected as the top offer (e.g. 'Main service promoted on homepage', 'Most expensive course'). (in German)
